sentences.en: Don't exaggerate the parallelism between the two cases.
sentences.cn: 不要夸大那两件事的相似性.

sentences.en: I fully persuaded that this double parallelism is by no means an accident or an illusion.
sentences.cn: 我充分确信,这种双重的平行现象,决非出于偶然,也决不是一种错觉.

sentences.en: Implicit parallelism and global searching are two characteristics of genetic algorithm.
sentences.cn: 隐含并行性和全局搜索特性是遗传算法的两大特点.

sentences.en: Multi - paradigm parallelism is the characteristic of large - scale parallel application systems.
sentences.cn: 多范例并行是大规模并行应用系统的本质特征.

sentences.en: O Henry's usage of parallelism featured well - knit plot and clear rhythm.
sentences.cn: 欧亨利的使用情况,并行精选,以及严密的阴谋,并清晰的节奏.

sentences.en: People's attitude is suspicion of axiom of choice and axiom of parallelism.
sentences.cn: 人们对平行公理和选择公理的态度都表现为:怀疑.

sentences.en: The fuller development of the parallelism was to lead to analytic geometry.
sentences.cn: 这种平行性的进一步发扬便导致了解析几何的产生.

sentences.en: The GPU is the vehicle for exploiting data parallelism.
sentences.cn: 该GPU是利用车辆的数据并行.

sentences.en: The last thing we should do is make any parallelism between the murderers and their victims.
sentences.cn: 我们最不应该做的一件事就是拿凶手和被害人来比较。

sentences.en: The parallelism in the classification of organisms and phytocoenoses is realized.
sentences.cn: 人们已认识到生物分类和植物群落分类是平行的.

sentences.en: There is a parallelism between fatigue and the ability to sleep.
Thses schemes have good degree of parallelism and don't need numerical bound.
sentences.cn: 其优点是有很好的并行度,且无需引入数值边界.

sentences.en: When you write a couplet, pay attention to antithetic parallelism and antithesis.
sentences.cn: 写对联时要注意排偶对仗.
